pkgmetadata.longdescription: Advanced statistics using R // Functions and data sets for a lecture in statistics using R. Only a few functions may be of general interest: 1.) mancontr(), short for manual contrasts, is a function that allows you to specify your own contrasts and give them useful names. 2.) norm.test(), allows to compare a normal qqplot to 8 qqplots with a sample from a normal distribution.
